snippet.title: Magical Amber: Tobi Tsukihime とびつきひめ - Normal ALL / 1CC - 599,204,916 [4K UHD]
snippet.description:
Normal(Arcade) 1CC Re-make/Arrange mode of Tobi Tsukihime.

It is basically a completely different game using the same assets as the previous release. IMO this is the better game.
Stages and boss fights have been completely re-designed, and the game uses an "item explosion/overflow" system where having a certain number of score items on screen triggers an auto-collect and gives you a bullet-canceling shield around you for a moment that you can use to clear  bullets with & turn them into blue score items. 

Godlike soundtrack. Great game.

I copied some strategies / gotten some help by Mishi, here's his 1cc of this game that he got a few days prior: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7CUgWKZJoUA
